Simulator¶

Simulated Camera¶

class simulator.simulator.SimulatedCamera[source]¶

Simulates the camera above the Pitch. Gets fed robot positions and ball positions and draws a frame that is retrievable via get_frame.

Colours are simulated in very simple manners such that thresholding is easy for the vision.

PITCH_HEIGHT = 640¶
PITCH_WIDTH = 480¶
draw(world)[source]¶

Top-level draw call. Draws the scene to the frame. Gets passed a World model and retrieves robot / ball positions from this.

fix_radial_distortion(frame)[source]¶
frame = None¶
get_adjusted_center(frame)[source]¶
get_frame()[source]¶

Similar to Camera, returns a frame containing the image of the Pitch in it’s current state.

Simulated Actoin¶

class simulator.simulator.SimulatedAction(simulator)[source]¶

SimulatedAction provides in-place replacement for the Action class. This replaces calls to communications by calls to the Simulator instance updating Robot’s actions.

MOTORS = [(-0.8660254037844387, 0.49999999999999994), (-1.8369701987210297e-16, -1.0), (0.8660254037844387, 0.49999999999999994)]¶
MOTOR_ANGLES = [2.6179938779914944, 4.71238898038469, 0.5235987755982988]¶
angle = 0.5235987755982988¶

Simulator¶

class simulator.simulator.Simulator(role)[source]¶

Our Simulator contains the logic for collisions, movement, and updating our internal simulated world state. This provides the core logic of the simulation.

ball_body = None¶
ball_posssessed = False¶
move_ball(angle)[source]¶
our_attacker_body = None¶
our_body[source]¶
our_defender_body = None¶
our_robot[source]¶
role = None¶
space = None¶
their_attacker_body = None¶
their_defender_body = None¶
update(dt=1)[source]¶

Steps the simulatoin and updates the world state to that of the simulation, returns the world object.

world = None¶
